rescuecore2.worldmodel

Interface Entity

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEntity, AmbulanceCentre, AmbulanceTeam, Area, Blockade, Building, Civilian, FireBrigade, FireStation, Human, PoliceForce, PoliceOffice, Refuge, Road, StandardEntity, World

    public interface Entity
    Interface for all objects that live in a WorldModel. Entities are made up of a fixed set of properties. The values of those properties may change but the set of properties may not.
